title: Patch Notes
content: the Incinerator Casters not working properly and therefore not accurately representing the area of danger. Fixed an issue with the Incinerator Casters' warning zone VFX, causing the warning zone to be inaccurate. Made sure Ritual Drain is applied correctly on Asta, Yousen, and Violet in the combat with Cazador. After ascending, Cazador will no longer receive healing from Vampire Regeneration.
